item.title: Jeremy Strong Circling ‘The Social Network Part II’ for Aaron Sorkin, Sony (Exclusive)
item.description: Sources say Strong could portray Mark Zuckerberg, replacing Jesse Eisenberg who played the Facebook CEO in the 2010 movie.
